general.gigTitle: do wix website design, redesign, build wix website or wix website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Transform Your Site with Wix and WordPress Magic
sellerCard.description:
Ever wondered what makes a website truly stand out? At Opsori Studio, we bring your vision to life with custom Wix and WordPress solutions! 🚀 Our passion lies in designing websites that not only look stunning but also drive results.

With our expertise in Wix customization and WordPress development, we’ll create a seamless online experience that reflects your brand's uniqueness. Whether you're launching a new site or revamping an old one, we’re here to ensure everything is pixel-perfect. Let’s team up and make your website the star of the show! 😄

description.content:
Do you want to build Wix website for your online business?


No worries, a Pro Wix developer is here to help.


With my in-depth expertise in Wix website development, I will create a fully functional, user-friendly, and responsive site for your company or business.


>> FOR MAXIMUM OUTPUT, DISCUSS WITH ME THE PROJECT FIRST <<


What You'll Get:


> Fully Functional & Pixel Perfect Wix Website Design and Development

> Wix Website Redesign or Any Existing Site

> Highly Converting Wix Landing Page Design

> Optimized Image Sliders + High Converting CTAs

> Contact Forms, Pop Ups, Social Media Integration

> Payment + E-Commerce Functionality Integration (if needed)

> Ensuring the Wix Web-site is Compatible with All Major Browsers and Devices

> 100% Easily Editable Dynamic Content and Detailed Q&A


Why Choose Me?


> Professional and Top-notch Service; Incorporating Your Feedback at All Stages

> 24/7 Fast & Fluent Communication (Literally)

> 10 Days of Free Support


Reach out to discuss your business goals today. Together, let's turn clicks into customers!

slide.name: do wix website design, redesign, build wix website or wix website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to get started? What should I provide you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To build your website, please provide me with your Wix host login, cPanel login, feature requirements, website content, Figma link or reference sites, and the page name. Let's discuss your website requirements before making any purchases.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide content or copy for the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Unfortunately, I do not create content or text for the web pages. But hey, if you've got some cool stuff like photos or text ready to go, I can add that to the website for you! Just pass it my way, and I'll get it uploaded onto your site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I get hosting and domain in this package?C
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Unfortunately no; we are unable to offer hosting and domain services for your website. You have to purchase the domain and hosting to store your website. However, we can provide recommendations on which hosting provider is best suited for your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have your email/WhatsApp/Skype details so we can communicate easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Unfortunately no. It's against Fiverr's ToS; all communication and transactions must occur through the platform. It's our best practice for ensuring a secure and transparent experience for everyone. If there's any project that aligns with the TOS, I'd be happy to collaborate with you on Fiverr.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive on desktop and mobile devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely. The website will be responsive on any device including mobiles, laptops, desktops, and others.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be SEO-optimized?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We will optimize your website for SEO using the Wix SEO tools. Please note that while our packages include the basic SEO structure, for complete SEO and ranking according to your keywords, you may need to contact another freelancer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my site in the future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! We build Wix websites using a flexible and easy-to-configure suite of tools. Once I deliver the site, you will be able to edit eCommerce products, images, descriptions, and prices, and add unlimited pages and posts too. No programming skills are required!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you offer website support after the delivery of the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I offer a complimentary 10-day support period after the website is completed and delivered. Additionally, paid ongoing support packages are available. Please consult me for that in my inbox.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you build or design any website for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I'd love to help build your Wix website! I can build a variety of websites using Wix, but not any adult, gambling, betting, or illegal activities websites.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you work as a solo developer or as part of a team?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We at Opsori Studio are a team of skilled website developers and creative designers who can handle multiple projects with ease.
